name: CustomerType
comment: Maintains valid values that represent the types of the customers who can be offered the services. The Service Provider can offer different products based on the customer type.Examples of customer types include:   * Residential * Business * Small and Medium Business
vf short description: Maintains valid values that represent the types of the customers who can be offered the services. The Service Provider can offer different products based on the customer type.

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: CustomerTypeKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the customer type in ALDM. Each customer type key value represents a unique customer type. Generated Key based on Customer Type Id

fields.name: CustomerTypeId
fields.comment: Identifies the customer type in the source system.For example:- E - Enterprise- C - Consumer customerType

fields.name: CustomerTypeShortDesc
fields.comment: Short description of the customer type, e.g. SME (means Small Medium Enterprises)

fields.name: CustomerTypeDesc
fields.comment: Description of the customer type.For example:- E = Enterprise- C = Consumer Short Description

fields.name: AnonymousFlag
fields.comment: Indicates that the customers with this customer type are anonymous customers, that is with no name, address, or any other demographic information. The anonymous customers are usually applicable for prepaid connections.

fields.name: BillZeroBalanceFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the customer balance is adjusted to zero at the end of the month.

fields.name: EnagedPartyReferredTypeId
fields.comment: Identifies the engaged party type related to customer type. Customer.engagedParty.referredType

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
